channel.title: Servers on Tiny Dev Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Servers on Tiny Dev Blog

item.title: You negotiate more often than you think
item.description: All of us have been “buried” for savings by “budget” modifications, which are clever technology solutions.The dialogue proceeds as follows: “Is X really necessary?” The sponsor of the project queries. Almost anything that is necessary for the system can be swapped out for X, including extra servers, software licenses, external backups, and power sources. The topic is always posed in a colloquial manner, as though you are spending all of your allowance on comic books and chewing gum, and mature individuals should consider investing in new shells, which will hold their future earnings. “Yes,” is the appropriate response to this query. utterly essential." But virtually nobody responds, for whatever reason. We have technical schooling, after all, and compromise is the skill of every technical profession.
